affirmations: I am worthy of love and respect.
I am capable of achieving my dreams.
I am grateful for the good in my life.
I choose to be happy and to love myself today.
I am confident in my abilities.
I am surrounded by positive and loving people.
I am creating a life I love.
I am open to new opportunities and experiences.
I am strong, resilient, and can handle anything that comes my way.
